trans-unit.source: Provides a stream used for client-server communication that uses the Secure Socket Layer (SSL) security protocol to authenticate the server and optionally the client.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于使用安全套接字层 (SSL) 安全协议进行身份验证服务器和 （可选） 客户端的客户端服务器通信流。

trans-unit.source: SSL protocols help to provide confidentiality and integrity checking for messages transmitted using an SslStream.
trans-unit.target: SSL 协议帮助提供保密性和完整性检查传输使用 SslStream 的消息。

trans-unit.source: An SSL connection, such as that provided by SslStream, should be used when communicating sensitive information between a client and a server.
trans-unit.target: 当客户端和服务器之间传输敏感信息时，应使用 SSL 连接，如提供的 SslStream。

trans-unit.source: Using an SslStream helps to prevent anyone from reading and tampering with information while it is in transit on the network.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SslStream 可帮助防止任何人读取和在网络上传输时被篡改的信息。

trans-unit.source: An SslStream instance transmits data using a stream that you supply when creating the SslStream.
trans-unit.target: SslStream 实例将使用在创建 SslStream 时提供的流的数据传输。

trans-unit.source: When you supply this underlying stream, you have the option to specify whether closing the SslStream also closes the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 提供此基础流，必须指定是否关闭 SslStream 也将关闭基础流的选项。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the SslStream class is used with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> classes.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，用于 SslStream 类<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>类。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.GetStream%2A> method provides a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> suitable for use with the SslStream class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.GetStream%2A>方法提供了<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>适用于 SslStream 类。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.GetStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: After creating an SslStream, the server and optionally, the client must be authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 在创建后 SslStream，服务器和 （可选） 客户端必须进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The server must provide an X509 certificate that establishes proof of its identity and can request that the client also do so.
trans-unit.target: 服务器必须提供一个 X509 证书建立的标识的概念，并可以请求，客户端也会这样。

trans-unit.source: Authentication must be performed before transmitting information using an SslStream.
trans-unit.target: 必须使用 SslStream 信息在传输之前执行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Clients initiate authentication using the synchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A> methods, which block until the authentication completes, or the asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> methods, which do not block waiting for the authentication to complete.
trans-unit.target: 客户端启动身份验证使用同步<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>方法，身份验证完成之前阻止，或异步<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>方法，不会阻止等待身份验证完成。</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: Servers initiate authentication using the synchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> or asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 服务器启动身份验证使用同步<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>或异步<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法。</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Both client and server must initiate the authentication.
trans-unit.target: 客户端和服务器必须启动身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The authentication is handled by the Security Support Provider (SSPI) channel provider.
trans-unit.target: 安全支持提供程序 (SSPI) 通道提供程序由处理身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The client is given an opportunity to control validation of the server's certificate by specifying a <xref:System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback> delegate when creating an SslStream.
trans-unit.target: 客户端有机会通过指定控制的服务器的证书验证<xref:System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback>委托创建 SslStream 时。</xref:System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback>

trans-unit.source: The server can also control validation by supplying a <xref:System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 服务器还可以通过提供控制验证<xref:System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback>委派。</xref:System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback>

trans-unit.source: The method referenced by the delegate includes the remote party's certificate and any errors SSPI encountered while validating the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 由委托引用的方法包括远程方的证书和 SSPI 验证证书时遇到任何错误。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the server specifies a delegate, the delegate's method is invoked regardless of whether the server requested client authentication.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，是否服务器指定一个委托，该委托的方法都会调用无论是否在服务器请求客户端身份验证。

trans-unit.source: If the server did not request client authentication, the server's delegate method receives a null certificate and an empty array of certificate errors.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器没有请求客户端身份验证，服务器的委托方法接收 null 证书和证书错误的空数组。

trans-unit.source: If the server requires client authentication, the client must specify one or more certificates for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器需要客户端身份验证，客户端必须指定一个或多个证书进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: If the client has more than one certificate, the client can provide a <xref:System.Net.Security.LocalCertificateSelectionCallback> delegate to select the correct certificate for the server.
trans-unit.target: 在客户端有多个证书，客户端可以提供<xref:System.Net.Security.LocalCertificateSelectionCallback>委托来选择正确的证书进行服务器。</xref:System.Net.Security.LocalCertificateSelectionCallback>

trans-unit.source: The client's certificates must be located in the current user's "My" certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 客户端的证书必须位于当前用户的"My"证书存储区。

trans-unit.source: Client authentication via certificates is not supported for the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols> (SSL version 2) protocol.
trans-unit.target: 不支持通过证书的客户端身份验证<xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols>(SSL 版本 2) 协议。</xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols>

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>, and the SslStream is no longer useable.
trans-unit.target: 如果身份验证失败，你收到<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>，和 SslStream 已不再使用。</xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>

trans-unit.source: You should close this object and remove all references to it so that it can be collected by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 您应关闭此对象，并删除对它的所有引用，以便它可以通过垃圾回收器收集。

trans-unit.source: When the authentication process, also known as the SSL handshake, succeeds, the identity of the server (and optionally, the client) is established and the SslStream can be used by the client and server to exchange messages.
trans-unit.target: 如果身份验证过程，也称为 SSL 握手，成功，则建立服务器 （和 （可选） 客户端） 的标识，而 SslStream 可以使用由客户端和服务器，以交换消息。

trans-unit.source: Before sending or receiving information, the client and server should check the security services and levels provided by the SslStream to determine whether the protocol, algorithms, and strengths selected meet their requirements for integrity and confidentiality.
trans-unit.target: 之前发送或接收信息，客户端和服务器应检查的安全服务和 SslStream 以确定是否协议、 算法和优势选择满足他们的完整性和保密性要求由提供的级别。

trans-unit.source: If the current settings are not sufficient, the stream should be closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前设置不能满足需求，应关闭流。

trans-unit.source: You can check the security services provided by the SslStream using the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以检查 SslStream 使用提供的安全服务<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A>属性。</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the elements that report the cryptographic settings used for authentication, encryption and data signing.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示报告用于身份验证、 加密和签名数据的加密设置的元素。

trans-unit.source: |Element|Members| |-------------|-------------| |The security protocol used to authenticate the server and, optionally, the client.|The <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.SslProtocol%2A> property and the associated <xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols> enumeration.| |The key exchange algorithm.|The <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.KeyExchangeAlgorithm%2A> property and the associated <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExchangeAlgorithmType> enumeration.| |The message integrity algorithm.|The <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.HashAlgorithm%2A> property and the associated <xref:System.Security.Authentication.HashAlgorithmType> enumeration.| |The message confidentiality algorithm.|The <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.CipherAlgorithm%2A> property and the associated <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType> enumeration.| |The strengths of the selected algorithms.|The <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.KeyExchangeStrength%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.HashStrength%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.CipherStrength%2A> properties.| After a successful authentication, you can send data using the synchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.Write%2A> or asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginWrite%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: |元素 |成员 | |-------------|-------------| |用于进行身份验证服务器和客户端 （可选） 的安全协议。 |<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.SslProtocol%2A>属性和关联的<xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols>枚举。 | |密钥交换算法。 |<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.KeyExchangeAlgorithm%2A>属性和关联的<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExchangeAlgorithmType>枚举。 | |消息完整性算法。 |<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.HashAlgorithm%2A>属性和关联的<xref:System.Security.Authentication.HashAlgorithmType>枚举。 | |消息保密性算法。 |<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.CipherAlgorithm%2A>属性和关联的<xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType>枚举。 | |所选算法的优势。 |<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.KeyExchangeStrength%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.HashStrength%2A>，和<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.CipherStrength%2A>属性。 | 身份验证成功后，你可以将数据发送使用同步<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.Write%2A>或异步<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginWrite%2A>方法。</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginWrite%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.Write%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.CipherStrength%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.HashStrength%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.KeyExchangeStrength%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.CipherAlgorithm%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.HashAlgorithmType> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.HashAlgorithm%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExchangeAlgorithmType> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.KeyExchangeAlgorithm%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.SslProtocol%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can receive data using the synchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.Read%2A> or asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginRead%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 你可以接收的数据使用同步<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.Read%2A>或异步<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginRead%2A>方法。</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginRead%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you specified to the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.%23ctor%2A> that the underlying stream should be left open, you are responsible for closing that stream when you are done using it.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定给<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.%23ctor%2A>基础流应保持打开状态，你将负责完成后关闭该流使用它。</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the application that creates the SslStream object runs with the credentials of a Normal user, the application will not be able to access certificates installed in the local machine store unless permission has been explicitly given to the user to do so.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 与普通用户的凭据运行的应用程序创建 SslStream 对象，如果应用程序将无法访问证书安装在本地计算机存储区中，除非权限已显式提供给用户若要这样做。

trans-unit.source: SslStream assumes that a timeout along with any other <xref:System.IO.IOException> when one is thrown from the inner stream will be treated as fatal by its caller.
trans-unit.target: SslStream 假定以及任何其他超时<xref:System.IO.IOException>一个从内部流的引发时将被视为致命由其调用方。</xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: Reusing a SslStream instance after a timeout will return garbage.
trans-unit.target: 超时将返回垃圾回收后重用 SslStream 实例。

trans-unit.source: An application should <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A> the SslStream and throw an exception in these cases.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序应<xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A>SslStream 和在这些情况下异常引发。</xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework 4.6 includes a new security feature that blocks insecure cipher and hashing algorithms for connections.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 4.6 包括一个新的安全功能，将阻止不安全的密码和哈希算法的连接。

trans-unit.source: Applications using TLS/SSL through APIs such as HttpClient, HttpWebRequest, FTPClient, SmtpClient, SslStream, etc. and targeting .NET Framework 4.6 get the more-secure behavior by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，使用 TLS/SSL 通过例如 HttpClient、 HttpWebRequest、 FTPClient、 SmtpClient、 SslStream 等的 Api 和面向.NET Framework 4.6 的应用程序获得更安全行为。

trans-unit.source: Developers may want to opt out of this behavior in order to maintain interoperability with their existing SSL3 services OR TLS w/ RC4 services.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员可能想要选择退出此行为以便保持其现有 SSL3 服务或 TLS 带 RC4 服务与互操作性。

trans-unit.source: [This article](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/3069494) explains how to modify your code so that the new behavior is disabled.
trans-unit.target: [这篇文章](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/3069494)说明如何修改你的代码，以便禁用新的行为。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework 4.6.3 adds new overloads for the methods that authenticate SslStreams that do not specify a TLS version, but instead use the TLS version defined as the system default in [SCHANNEL](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa380123.aspx).
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 4.6.3 添加新的重载的方法的身份验证不指定 TLS 版本，但改为使用 TLS 版本定义中的系统默认值为 SslStreams [SCHANNEL](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa380123.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: Use these methods in your app as a way to be able to later modify the defaults as TLS version best practice changes over time, without the need to rebuild and redeploy your app.
trans-unit.target: 作为一种方法能够随着时间推移，TLS 版本最佳做法更改为更高版本修改的默认值在应用中使用这些方法而无需重新生成并重新部署你的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref> class using the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref>类使用的指定<xref:System.IO.Stream>。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: If a value is not specified in the configuration file for encryptionpolicy, the <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy> defaults to <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName> for the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> instance that is constructed.
trans-unit.target: 如果在配置文件中为 encryptionpolicy，未指定值<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy>默认为<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName>为<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>构造的实例。</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> </xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy>

trans-unit.source: The use of the Null cipher is required when the encryption policy is set to <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Null 加密的使用时是必需的加密策略设置为<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> object used by the <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref> for sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.IO.Stream>使用对象<xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref>用于发送和接收数据。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: innerStream is not readable.
trans-unit.target: innerStream不可读。

trans-unit.source: -or- innerStream is not writable.
trans-unit.target: -或-innerStream不是可写。

trans-unit.source: innerStream is .
trans-unit.target: innerStreamis .

trans-unit.source: -or- innerStream is equal to .
trans-unit.target: -innerStream等同于。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref> class using the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream> and stream closure behavior.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref>类使用指定<xref:System.IO.Stream>和流封闭行为。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: When you specify `true` for the `leaveStreamOpen` parameter, closing the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> has no effect on the `innerStream` stream; you must explicitly close `innerStream` when you no longer need it.
trans-unit.target: 当指定`true`为`leaveStreamOpen`参数，关闭<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>不起任何作用`innerStream`流式传输; 您必须显式关闭`innerStream`不再需要它。</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>

trans-unit.source: If a value is not specified in the configuration file for encryptionpolicy, the <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy> defaults to <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName> for the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> instance that is constructed.
trans-unit.target: 如果在配置文件中为 encryptionpolicy，未指定值<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy>默认为<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName>为<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>构造的实例。</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> </xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy>

trans-unit.source: The use of the Null cipher is required when the encryption policy is set to <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Null 加密的使用时是必需的加密策略设置为<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> object used by the <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref> for sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.IO.Stream>使用对象<xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref>用于发送和接收数据。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates the closure behavior of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object used by the <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref> for sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，该值指示的闭包行为<xref:System.IO.Stream>使用对象<xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref>用于发送和接收数据。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: This parameter indicates if the inner stream is left open.
trans-unit.target: 此参数指示是否内部流处于打开状态。

trans-unit.source: innerStream is not readable.
trans-unit.target: innerStream不可读。

trans-unit.source: -or- innerStream is not writable.
trans-unit.target: -或-innerStream不是可写。

trans-unit.source: innerStream is .
trans-unit.target: innerStreamis .

trans-unit.source: -or- innerStream is equal to .
trans-unit.target: -innerStream等同于。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref> class using the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream>, stream closure behavior and certificate validation delegate.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref>类使用指定<xref:System.IO.Stream>、 流闭包行为和证书验证委托。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: When you specify `true` for the `leaveStreamOpen` parameter, closing the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> has no effect on the `innerStream` stream; you must explicitly close `innerStream` when you no longer need it.
trans-unit.target: 当指定`true`为`leaveStreamOpen`参数，关闭<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>不起任何作用`innerStream`流式传输; 您必须显式关闭`innerStream`不再需要它。</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>

trans-unit.source: The `userCertificateValidationCallback` delegate's `certificateErrors` argument contains any Windows error codes returned by the channel Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI).
trans-unit.target: `userCertificateValidationCallback`委托的`certificateErrors`参数中包含的任何返回的通道安全支持提供程序接口 (SSPI) 的 Windows 错误代码。

trans-unit.source: The return value of the method invoked by the `userCertificateValidationCallback` delegate determines whether authentication succeeds.
trans-unit.target: 由调用的方法的返回值`userCertificateValidationCallback`委托确定身份验证是否成功。

trans-unit.source: The security protocol and cryptographic algorithms are already selected when the `userCertificateValidationCallback` delegate's method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 安全协议和加密算法包已选择时`userCertificateValidationCallback`调用委托的方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use the method to determine whether the selected cryptographic algorithms and strengths are sufficient for your application.
trans-unit.target: 该方法可用于确定所选的加密算法和优势是否能够满足你的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: If not, the method should return `false` to prevent the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> from being created.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是，该方法应返回`false`以防止<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>从正在创建。</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Framework caches SSL sessions as they are created and attempts to reuse a cached session for a new request, if possible.

trans-unit.source: When attempting to reuse an SSL session, the Framework uses the first element of <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates%2A> (if there is one), or tries to reuse an anonymous sessions if <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates%2A> is empty.

trans-unit.source: The return value of the method invoked by the `userCertificateValidationCallback` delegate determines whether authentication succeeds.
trans-unit.target: 由调用的方法的返回值`userCertificateValidationCallback`委托确定身份验证是否成功。

trans-unit.source: The security protocol and cryptographic algorithms are already selected when the `userCertificateValidationCallback` delegate's method is invoked.

trans-unit.source: You can use the method to determine whether the selected cryptographic algorithms and strengths are sufficient for your application.
trans-unit.target: 该方法可用于确定所选的加密算法和优势是否能够满足你的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The authentication process uses the specified certificate collection and SSL protocol.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证过程使用指定的证书集合和 SSL 协议。

trans-unit.source: When authentication succeeds, you must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证成功后，你必须检查<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A>属性，以确定由<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>使用哪些安全服务</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A></xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A> property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>属性以确定是否发生了相互身份验证。</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>, and this <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> is no longer useable.
trans-unit.target: 如果身份验证失败，你收到<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>，并且此<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>已不再使用。</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>

trans-unit.source: You should close this object and remove all references to it so that it can be collected by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 您应关闭此对象，并删除对它的所有引用，以便它可以通过垃圾回收器收集。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Client certificates are not supported in the SSL version 2 protocol.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> SSL 版本 2 协议中不支持客户端证书。

trans-unit.source: The name of the server that will share this <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 将共享此服务器的名称<xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> that contains client certificates.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref>包含客户端证书。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols> value that represents the protocol used for authentication.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols>值，该值表示用于身份验证的协议。</xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> value that specifies whether the certificate revocation list is checked during authentication.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Boolean>值，该值指定是否在身份验证过程检查证书吊销列表。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>表示异步操作的任务对象。</xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>

trans-unit.source: The certificate revocation list is not checked during authentication.
trans-unit.target: 不会在身份验证过程检查证书吊销列表。

trans-unit.source: The client is not required to provide a certificate for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 客户端不需要提供身份验证证书。

trans-unit.source: This method blocks until the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法阻止，直至该操作完成。

trans-unit.source: To prevent blocking until the operation completes, use one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> method overloads.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止在操作完成之前一直阻止，使用之一<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法重载。</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Called by clients to begin an asynchronous operation to authenticate the server and optionally the client.
trans-unit.target: 由客户端开始一个异步操作以验证服务器和 （可选） 客户端调用。

trans-unit.source: This method authenticates using <xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法进行身份验证使用<xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols>.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols>

trans-unit.source: No client certificates are used in the authentication.
trans-unit.target: 任何客户端证书身份验证中不使用。

trans-unit.source: The certificate revocation list is not checked during authentication.
trans-unit.target: 不会在身份验证过程检查证书吊销列表。

trans-unit.source: The value specified for `targetHost` must match the name on the server's certificate.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的值`targetHost`上服务器的证书的名称必须匹配。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous authentication operation must be completed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.EndAuthenticateAsClient%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 必须通过调用完成异步身份验证操作<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.EndAuthenticateAsClient%2A>方法。</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.EndAuthenticateAsClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，通过调用该方法`asyncCallback`委托。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block while the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 在操作完成时，此方法不会阻止。

trans-unit.source: To block until the operation completes, use one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A> method overloads.
trans-unit.target: 若要阻止该操作完成之前，请使用之一<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>方法重载。</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) If you receive a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>, this <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> is no longer useable.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)如果你收到<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>，则此<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>已不再使用。</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>

trans-unit.source: If successful authentication has occurred, this property returns the value returned by invoking <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanWrite%2A> on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 如果发生了成功的身份验证，此属性返回通过调用返回的值<xref:System.IO.Stream.CanWrite%2A>对基础流。</xref:System.IO.Stream.CanWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: The underlying stream is specified when you create an instance of the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> class.
trans-unit.target: 基础流是在创建<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>类</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>的实例时指定

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if authentication has occurred and the underlying stream is writable; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已进行身份验证，而且基础流可写;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the certificate revocation list is checked during the certificate validation process.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Boolean>值，该值指示是否在证书验证过程检查证书吊销列表。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: The certificate revocation list contains certificates that have been revoked by the issuer.
trans-unit.target: 证书吊销列表包含已吊销由颁发者颁发的证书。

trans-unit.source: Checking the list negatively impacts performance but improves application security.
trans-unit.target: 在列表中检查产生负面影响性能，但可以提高应用程序安全性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the certificate revocation list is checked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果检查证书吊销列表;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies the bulk encryption algorithm used by this <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，标识使用的批量加密算法<xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType> is required for the CipherAlgorithm property when the <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy> enumeration value is used to construct a <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> instance.
trans-unit.target: 值为<xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType>CipherAlgorithm 属性要求时<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy>枚举值用于构造<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>实例。</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> </xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/add/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/add/includes/winxp-md.md)] do not support the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType> value.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/add/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/add/includes/winxp-md.md)]不支持<xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType>值。</xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType>

trans-unit.source: So even if the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType> value is used to construct the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> instance, the <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy> property will be <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，即使<xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType>值用于构造的<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>实例，<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy>属性将为<xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType>.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType> </xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType> value is only returned on Windows Vista and later.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType>Windows Vista 及更高版本，才返回值。</xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType> value.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType>值。</xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType>

trans-unit.source: The CipherAlgorithm property was accessed before the completion of the authentication process or the authentication process failed.
trans-unit.target: 在完成身份验证过程或身份验证过程失败之前，已访问 CipherAlgorithm 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies the strength of the cipher algorithm used by this <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，标识使用的加密算法的强度<xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is zero until the authentication occurs.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证之前，此属性的值为零。

trans-unit.source: This property returns one of the following values: - 0 - 40 - 56 - 80 - 128 - 168 - 192 - 256
An <xref:System.Int32> value that specifies the strength of the algorithm, in bits.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>值，该值以位为单位指定该算法的强度。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由非托管的资源<xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"> </xref> ，还可以释放托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>引用。</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用`Dispose()`每个引用对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要释放托管和非托管资源;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若要仅释放非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: Ends a pending asynchronous server authentication operation started with a previous call to <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer*>.
trans-unit.target: 结束到<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer*>。</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer*>以前调用启动的挂起的异步服务器身份验证操作

trans-unit.source: If the operation has not completed, this method blocks until it does.
trans-unit.target: 如果该操作未完成，此方法阻止，直至它执行。

trans-unit.source: When the authentication succeeds, you must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref> uses data encryption.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Boolean>值，该值指示是否这<xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref>使用数据加密。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Encryption helps to protect the privacy of the data, namely it helps to ensure that while data is in transit, it cannot be deciphered by third parties.
trans-unit.target: 加密有助于保护的数据的隐私，即它可帮助确保，在传输过程中的数据时，它不能破译由第三方。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data is encrypted before being transmitted over the network and decrypted when it reaches the remote endpoint; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果正在通过网络传输之前加密和解密数据在它到达远程终结点;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether both server and client have been authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Boolean>值，该值指示是否已验证服务器和客户端。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Mutual authentication is specified by the server when the server wants the client to provide a certificate for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 服务器想客户端提供一个证书进行身份验证时，将服务器指定相互身份验证。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the server has been authenticated; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果服务器已经过身份验证;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the local side of the connection used by this <xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref> was authenticated as the server.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Boolean>值，该值指示由此是否使用连接的本地端<xref href="System.Net.Security.SslStream"></xref>与服务器进行身份验证。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: If authentication failed or did not occur, this property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果身份验证失败，或者没有出现，则此属性返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: To authenticate as the server, call the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要与服务器进行身份验证，调用<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法。</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> </xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the local endpoint was successfully authenticated as the server side of the authenticated connection; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the data sent using this stream is signed.

trans-unit.source: Data signing helps to protect the integrity of the data, namely it helps the recipient determine whether the data has been tampered with while in transit.
trans-unit.target: 数据签名有助于保护数据的完整性，即它可以帮助收件人确定是否数据已被篡改在传输过程中。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data is signed before being transmitted; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果数据在传输; 前已签名否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> class does not support multiple simultaneous write operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>类不支持多个同时进行的写入操作。</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Byte> array that supplies the bytes written to the stream.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Byte>提供写入流中的字节的数组。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int32> that contains the zero-based location in `buffer` at which to begin reading bytes to be written to the stream.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int32> that contains the number of bytes to read from `buffer`.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Int32>，其中包含要读取的字节数`buffer`。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time a write operation blocks waiting for data.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置等待数据写入操作的时间量。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value returned by invoking <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A> on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回通过调用返回的值<xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A>对基础流。</xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: For set operations, the specified value sets the <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A> value on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 对于集合运算指定的值设置<xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A>对基础流的值。</xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the underlying stream is a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, WriteTimeout is in milliseconds and is set to <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite> by default so that write operations do not timeout.
trans-unit.target: 如果基础流已<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>，WriteTimeout 以毫秒为单位，并且设置为<xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>默认情况下，因此，编写操作就不会超时。</xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int32> that specifies the amount of time that elapses before a synchronous write operation fails.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Int32>，它指定的同步写入操作失败之前经过的时间量。</xref:System.Int32>
